Name: Zimmer
About the game: Here are just some things you can do in Zimmer Loot treasure chests Sacrifice at an altar Drink from a fountain Break almost any object Go shopping Steal from a shop Murder Rub a magic lamp Mine some gold Enhance your armor at an anvil Avoid traps Lure monsters onto traps Keep a deer in your pocket for emergency use Turn your enemies into stone Step on a dart trap Get hit by a dart Step on it again, dodge the darts Pick up the darts Get an Amulet of Explosive Darts Use the explosive darts for fun and profit Blow yourself up with your own explosion You are in a room with three doors. Two doors lead to traps and monsters, the third door will contain a room with a treasure and three more doors. An action roguelike, heavily inspired by games such as nethack. Entirely procedurally generated, no two runs will be the same. You can ascend in less than an hour, depending on how fast you play, it could be much shorter or longer. 100 levels, or endless mode 5 zones 40+ unique items 6 starting classes with random stats and buffs/debuffs 4 bosses Lots of traps and monsters 17 song chiptune soundtrack
Meta Title: Zimmer: Sep 12, 2022, Andrew Rizzo and Full Overview
